definition: to be so in pain as to not want to live/to be so grieved as to wish one were dead
ache/pain/sorrow/deeply/thoroughly
(negative prefix)/not/no
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]
desire/appetite/passion/lust/greed
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: The wife who becomes an emperor a full blood the greatly hugs in the bosom, pain not the desire living.
sentences.chinese: 大成皇上把沁满鲜血的妻子搂在怀里，痛不欲生。

sentences.english: Mark beat his breast in agony .
sentences.chinese: 马克捶胸顿足，痛不欲生。

sentences.english: The country laboured under a massive debt burden.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家背负了巨额债务，痛不欲生。

sentences.english: Being humiliated for no justified reason, we would think of death.
sentences.chinese: 被他人无端地羞辱，我们会痛不欲生。

sentences.english: The man's conscience woke and smote him with remorse; and he repented having stolen the melon.
sentences.chinese: 他良心发现，痛不欲生，为自己偷了西瓜而忏悔。

sentences.english: Chu people of peril and suffering, pain Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 楚国的危亡和百姓的痛苦，屈原痛不欲生。

definition: to hover between life and death (idiom)/to suffer terribly/within an inch of one's life
lit. liver and guts cut to pieces (idiom)/fig. grief-stricken
to feel distressed about sth/heartache/cardiac pain
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to torment/to torture
to feel as if having one's heart cut out (idiom)/to be torn with grief
to feel a pain like a knife being twisted in one's heart (idiom)
heartbroken/extreme depth of sorrow
nervous breakdown
pain/suffering/painful/CL:個|个[ge4]
every hope turns to dust (idiom); completely disheartened
ache/pain/sorrow/deeply/thoroughly
heartbroken/inconsolable
to bathe one's face in tears (idiom)
hard to endure/unbearable
to regret one's past deeds (idiom)
